translations.name: New Geneva Translation
translations.description: The New Geneva Translation (NGU) is a German-language edition of the New Testament, the Psalms, and the Proverbs. In order to more adequately conform to the needs of everyday German-speakers, the NGU uses a dynamic equivalence approach—meaning by meaning instead of word for word—to translating the ancient Greek and Hebrew texts. The complete Bible was published in 2015.
